title: GoPro HERO 10 Teaser video previews new action cam coming September 16th!
content:
Apple’s not the only one launching new tech this week. GoPro is set to release their new HERO 10 action camera on Thursday morning, September 16, 2021. It’s an annual upgrade, and the best we can tell from the teaser spot it’s using the same form factor as the HERO 9, and from the looks

The post GoPro HERO 10 Teaser video previews new action cam coming September 16th! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
